plays.text: Penalty to Magnus Arvedson 2 minutes for Holding Alexander Frolov
Penalty to Erik Rasmussen 2 minutes for Tripping Todd White
Goal scored by Bryan Smolinski assisted by Alexander Frolov and Craig Johnson
Penalty to Radek Bonk 2 minutes for Hooking Mikko Eloranta
Penalty to Aaron Miller 2 minutes for Roughing Marian Hossa
Penalty to Erik Rasmussen 2 minutes for Slashing(opposing player not identified)
Goal scored by Zigmund Palffy assisted by Steve Heinze and Derek Armstrong
Goal scored by Zigmund Palffy unassisted
Penalty to Daniel Alfredsson 2 minutes for Crosschecking Zigmund Palffy
